title: Looking For Players for OOL (Pref Diamond +)
body:
Our team Something Legit, was placed 5th/8th Week 3 of OOL, and is placed 13th total so far, so we are looking for players to help make our team into playoffs/finals week 5. We will accept plat players but we are looking more into diamond+ players, that are willing to co-operate and work as a team. and new teams that enter week 4 aren't able to make it through playoffs/finals week 5 due to the lack of points from previous weeks.

We are currently looking for,
Mid Laner, and potentially a Top Laner.
Although we have subs to fill in if needed.

But have a fairly big champion pool and know their champions, and relevant to meta.
As our team looks to make playoffs once again and win some RP.

as our team plans to go to week 5, thank you.
Contact: Vincent Jr
